title: Replace current VS logo image with newly uploaded logo (IMG_20260212_214859~4.png)

requirements.text: Generate new static transparent PNG logo assets that match the newly uploaded image (IMG_20260212_214859~4.png) exactly (same proportions, colors, and stroke weights) and save them under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: remove that VS image and past my image

acceptanceCriteria: New PNG assets are created from IMG_20260212_214859~4.png with transparent backgrounds.
Assets are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and use the .dim_WxH.png naming convention.
At least one horizontal header-sized logo and at least one square favicon-sized logo are produced.

requirements.text: Update the site header logo in frontend/src/App.tsx to use the newly generated logo asset(s) instead of the currently referenced /assets/generated/vs-logo-uploaded-exact-horizontal.dim_800x300.png, preserving responsive sizing and aspect ratio.

quotes: remove that VS image and past my image

acceptanceCriteria: The header renders the new uploaded logo clearly on mobile and desktop with w-auto and object-contain behavior preserved.
The existing alt text remains in English.

requirements.text: Update the favicon reference in frontend/index.html to use the newly generated favicon asset(s) instead of the currently referenced /assets/generated/vs-favicon-uploaded-exact.dim_64x64.png.

quotes: remove that VS image and past my image

acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab favicon displays the new uploaded logo.

constraints: Do not serve images from the backend; all logo files must be static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
All user-facing text must remain in English.
nonGoals: Redesigning the site layout, colors, or typography beyond what is necessary to swap the logo assets.
Changing backend (Motoko) data models or APIs.

required: Transparent-background horizontal logo matching IMG_20260212_214859~4.png exactly (vs-logo-uploaded-exact-v4-horizontal.dim_800x300.png)
Transparent-background horizontal logo matching IMG_20260212_214859~4.png exactly (vs-logo-uploaded-exact-v4-horizontal.dim_400x150.png)
Transparent-background square logo matching IMG_20260212_214859~4.png exactly (vs-logo-uploaded-exact-v4-square.dim_512x512.png)
